item.title: AAROGYAM 1.3
item.description: AAROGYAM 1.3 consist of 120 test and consist of fundamental test for screaning of the health staus like IRON DEFICIENCY, LIVER, COMPLETE HEMOGRAM, DIABETES, CARDIAC RISK MARKERS, RENAL, TOXIC ELEMENTS, LIPID, SUBSET, ELEMENTS, THYROID, HORMONE, VITAMIN
